head.title: IN BRIEF: Honors; LIFETIME ACHIEVEMENT AWARD

hedline.hl1: IN BRIEF: Honors; LIFETIME ACHIEVEMENT AWARD

abstract.p: Environmental Advocates of Albany gives lifetime achievement award to Assemblywoman Audrey G Hochberg, who is retiring, for her efforts on behalf of New York State's solid waste policy (S)

block.p: Environmental Advocates, a lobbying group in Albany, has given a lifetime achievement award to Assemblywoman Audrey G. Hochberg, who is retiring, for her efforts on behalf of the state's solid waste policy. Appointed to the state's Legislative Commission on Solid Waste in 1999, Ms. Hochberg, who represents the 88th Assembly District, organized a hearing to examine recycling programs. ''Audrey Hochberg's commitments to public service and environmental issues earn her our deepest gratitude,'' Environmental Advocates said.
